{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl header|scoped_allocator}}
{{dcl | num=1 | since=c++11 | 
outer_allocator_type&amp; outer_allocator() noexcept;
}}
{{dcl | num=2 | since=c++11 | 
const outer_allocator_type&amp; outer_allocator() const noexcept;
}}
{{dcl end}}

Obtains a reference to the outer allocator used to declare this class.

@1@ Returns {{c|static_cast&lt;OuterAlloc&amp;&gt;(*this)}}.

@2@ Returns {{c|static_cast&lt;const OuterAlloc&amp;&gt;(*this)}}.

===Parameters===
(none)

===Return value===
A reference to {{tt|OuterAlloc}}.
